thread.title: Remember: Donald Trump Tweeted This Disgusting Thing About Kate Middleton in 2012
thread.title_full: Remember: Donald Trump Tweeted This Disgusting Thing About Kate Middleton in 2012

author: Alyssa Bailey
title: Remember: Donald Trump Tweeted This Disgusting Thing About Kate Middleton in 2012
text:
From ELLE News broke this afternoon that President Donald Trump has accepted an invitation from the Queen of England to come to England on a state visit. It's unclear whether Prince William, Prince Harry, or Kate Middleton will be in attendance during this, but the Duchess of Cambridge already has a good reason to skip out.
Buzzfeed just posted a reminder that in 2012, then-presidential hopeful Donald Trump had this to say when topless photos of KMidd, snapped by paparazzi while she was sunbathing on a private vacation, were going around:
View photos
Photo credit: Twitter More To answer Trump's question, six people who were accused of profiting off those photos reportedly went on trial earlier this month . If convicted, they face jail time and a hefty fine.
But should Trump have any other question on this, the commenters in 2012 helped him out:
. @realDonaldTrump Basically any decent human being.
- Guy Endore-Kaiser (@GuyEndoreKaiser) September 17, 2012 @realDonaldTrump Oh I don't know, someone that has morals. Oh sorry I forgot, you don't know that word! Here: http://t.co/8bFnI16e
- Kaj-Erik Eriksen (@KajEriksen) September 17, 2012 Trump got heat then for the remark...and is again now in light of the announcement:
@realDonaldTrump Please tell me you're joking. It's called PRIVACY. She deserves it. Don't cheer on these pitiful paparazzi's!! #rude
- Duchess of Cambridge (@RoyalKMiddleton) September 18, 2012 @realDonaldTrump brutal. What about right to privacy? You'd change your tune if it was Ivanka.
- Eric Charters (@EricCharters) September 17, 2012 @realDonaldTrump If someone creeped on your wife with a long lense while she was in a private place youâ€™d go absolutely ape-shit & sue.
- Steven (((Knight))) (@steveyknight) September 17, 2012 . @realDonaldTrump I really wouldn't have expected something so vile from someone like you....haha i'm just kidding! you're the worst.
- thatsucks (@lookatmeimcool) September 17, 2012 @realDonaldTrump How about if someone takes a picture of your wife's breasts and makes money off of it?! How would YOU like it?! #douche
- Kate Middleton Fans (@RoyallyKate) September 18, 2012 @realDonaldTrump didn't you get mad at cnn for using a picture of your face that you didn't like
- Sarah McLaughlin (@sarahemclaugh) January 8, 2017 @realDonaldTrump Once a disgusting pig, always a disgusting pig, Trump. Husband/Father/Grandfather of year, aren't ya?
- Just DawnðŸŒž (@Ghic_Chic) January 27, 2017 The Duchess isn't the only royal family member Trump has tweeted about either. Buzzfeed found this tweet about Prince George...
View photos
Photo credit: Twitter More Sad!
